text: Hagi fri vahe kumapintira, ru kumapi hankavenentake kva vahe'mo'za Isipi vaheku'ene zamazama nehaza vahe'mokizmigura kiza zokago kea huzmante'za amanage hugahaze, ama vahe'mo'za zamagoza anoma taga osu vahetamima bainati kazinteti'ma zamahe fri'naza vahe mani'nafi mani'naku eramize hu'za hugahaze.
